name: Captive Pursuit
Lore: 'Han could have used a hand. Fortunately, Luke still had one to give.',
Text: 'USED: If a battle was just initiated at a site, target a captive present. Captive released if you win battle.LOST: Cancel Aiiii! Aaa! Aggggggggggggg!, Sonic Bombardment, Interrogation Array, This Is Some Rescue or Special Delivery.',
